description.english: Escaping at the very first chance.
description.schinese: 拿到钥匙赶紧走人。
description.tchinese: 拿到鑰匙趕緊走人。

description.english: Leaving the house and all of the memory inside without a second glance.
description.schinese: 一走了之，不再回头。
description.tchinese: 一走了之，不再回頭。

description.english: Selling the house albeit with regrets of losing everything about his family.
description.schinese: 尽管失去了原来家庭的一切，还是卖掉了房子。
description.tchinese: 儘管失去了原來家庭的一切，還是賣掉了房子。

description.english: Getting out from the house safely.
description.schinese: 安全地离开屋子。
description.tchinese: 安全地離開屋子。

description.english: Leaving the house with the lingering spirit around.
description.schinese: 离开这所幽灵四处游荡的屋子。
description.tchinese: 離開這所幽靈四處遊蕩的屋子。

description.english: Selling the house with complaints about the supernatural entity that resides there.
description.schinese: 带着一通抱怨出售房子。
description.tchinese: 帶著一通抱怨出售房子。

description.english: Having a hard bargain, but thankfully the house is finally sold.
description.schinese: 房子在大降价后终于成功出售了。
description.tchinese: 房子在大降價後終於成功出售了。

description.english: Telling lies to the buyer to have the highest bargain.
description.schinese: 向出价最高的买家撒谎。
description.tchinese: 向出價最高的買家撒謊。

description.english: Having a nostalgic trip by recalling the old moments in the house.
description.schinese: 怀念起曾经在这里的美好时光。
description.tchinese: 懷念起曾經在這裡的美好時光。

description.english: Staying together with her as a family once more.
description.schinese: 再一次和她相聚。
description.tchinese: 再一次和她相聚。

description.english: Getting complaint from the next residents of the house.
description.schinese: 听到房子新住户的抱怨。
description.tchinese: 聽到房子新住戶的抱怨。

description.english: Deciding to just live in the house because the house cannot be sold.
description.schinese: 卖不掉房子，只能自己住下了。
description.tchinese: 賣不掉房子，只能自己住下了。

description.english: Turning the house into a courage test site for a reality TV show.
description.schinese: 把房子变成一个电视真人秀节目的胆量测试场景地。
description.tchinese: 把房子變成一個電視真人秀節目的膽量測試場景地。

description.english: Leaving the offering ritual unfinished and running away cowardly.
description.schinese: 在仪式准备过程中逃离。
description.tchinese: 在儀式準備過程中逃離。

description.english: Running away from her wrath when it is very close to just sell it away.
description.schinese: 威摄于她的愤怒从而逃跑。即使房子快成功出售了。
description.tchinese: 威攝於她的憤怒從而逃跑。即使房子快成功出售了。

description.english: Ending up not selling the house, letting it be.
description.schinese: 停止出售房子，让它闲置。
description.tchinese: 停止出售房子，讓它閒置。

description.english: Thinking that selling the house is not possible in your current state.
description.schinese: 发现目前的状态下出售房子是不可能的。
description.tchinese: 發現目前的狀態下出售房子是不可能的。

description.english: Realizing that what matter the most is just cleaning the house up.
description.schinese: 意识到当务之急是打扫房子。
description.tchinese: 意識到當務之急是打掃房子。

description.english: Letting the house in a mess, dirty and haunted.
description.schinese: 让屋子保持原状吧。
description.tchinese: 讓屋子保持原狀吧。

description.english: Selling the house hastily resulting nothing.
description.schinese: 匆匆忙忙出售房子，结果一无所获。
description.tchinese: 匆匆忙忙出售房子，結果一無所獲。

displayName.english: Rest in Peace: The White Lady

description.english: Giving Nenden a chance to be at peace in the afterlife.
description.schinese: 给尼登安息的机会。
description.tchinese: 給尼登安息的機會。

description.english: Getting married using the family ring, even though it feels wrong.
description.schinese: 用家族流传的戒指当作婚戒结婚，尽管感觉这样并不合适。
description.tchinese: 用家族流傳的戒指當作婚戒結婚，儘管感覺這樣並不合適。

description.english: Ending up working at Dad's old plantation.
description.schinese: 接手打理父亲留下的种植园。
description.tchinese: 接手打理父親留下的種植園。

description.english: Getting followed by The White Lady for taking her beloved possession.
description.schinese: 拿走了白衣鬼妇最心爱的东西，只能被她追随了。
description.tchinese: 拿走了白衣鬼婦最心愛的東西，只能被她追隨了。

description.english: Seeking a help from a shaman to make Nenden rest in peace.
description.schinese: 寻求法师的帮助以让尼登的灵魂得以安息。
description.tchinese: 尋求法師的幫助以讓尼登的靈魂得以安息。

description.english: Taking drugs to be together again, but it's not your time yet.
description.schinese: 准备吃药以和家人团聚，不过时机未到。
description.tchinese: 準備吃藥以和家人團聚，不過時機未到。

description.english: Disrespecting the tree and those who live there.
description.schinese: 对菩提树以及此地的居住者不敬。
description.tchinese: 對菩提樹以及此地的居住者不敬。

description.english: Giving rude remarks about her possession.
description.schinese: 对她的心爱之物无礼。
description.tchinese: 對她的心愛之物無禮。

description.english: Acquiring a new shamanic power.
description.schinese: 获得一股全新的力量。
description.tchinese: 獲得一股全新的力量。

description.english: Sleeping and ruining the three day plan.
description.schinese: 睡了三天，不按计划行事。
description.tchinese: 睡了三天，不按計劃行事。

description.english: Leaking gas ends up in great fire.
description.schinese: 煤气泄漏，终酿火灾。
description.tchinese: 煤氣洩漏，終釀火災。

description.english: Hiding until morning is probably better for health.
description.schinese: 躲藏到早上也许是个明智选择。
description.tchinese: 躲藏到早上也許是個明智選擇。

description.english: Calling something it's not and triggering some other folks.
description.schinese: 把抱枕当成其它的东西可不是什么好主意。
description.tchinese: 把抱枕當成其它的東西可不是什麼好主意。

description.english: Getting shocked in the middle of hiding..
description.schinese: 在躲藏的过程中被惊到了。
description.tchinese: 在躲藏的過程中被驚到了。

description.english: Being locked in the wardrobe and can't get out.
description.schinese: 被锁在衣柜中出不去。
description.tchinese: 被鎖在衣櫃中出不去。

description.english: Retiring from the job and refusing a request to help someone.
description.schinese: 放弃这份工作，不想再继续下去。
description.tchinese: 放棄這份工作，不想再繼續下去。

description.english: Leaving the cemetery to escape from the madness.
description.schinese: 离开墓地，逃离这一切疯狂。
description.tchinese: 離開墓地，逃離這一切瘋狂。

description.english: Being irresponssible by leaving the cemetery without a notification.
description.schinese: 未通知他人就擅自离开墓地结束这份工作，这样会引发严重的后果。
description.tchinese: 未通知他人就擅自離開墓地結束這份工作，這樣會引發嚴重的後果。

description.english: Giving up the possibly best job ever.
description.schinese: 放弃一份也许是非常好的工作。
description.tchinese: 放棄一份也許是非常好的工作。

description.english: Quitting to find another job available in the town.
description.schinese: 放弃当守墓人，到城里另找工作。
description.tchinese: 放棄當守墓人，到城裡另找工作。

description.english: Procrastinating the tasks as if they will be finished by themselves in the next day.
description.schinese: 不按时完成工作，好像它们会自己完成一样。
description.tchinese: 不按時完成工作，好像它們會自己完成一樣。

description.english: Being responsible by finishing all the tasks, but a mistake ruins it all.
description.schinese: 尽职尽责地完成了所有工作，但一个错误将这一切毁于一旦。
description.tchinese: 盡職盡責地完成了所有工作，但一個錯誤將這一切毀於一旦。

description.english: Having a bad dream. It seems sleeping is not a way to end everything.
description.schinese: 做了一个噩梦。似乎睡觉并不能阻止一切的发生。
description.tchinese: 做了一個噩夢。似乎睡覺並不能阻止一切的發生。

description.english: Leaving the village to pursue a dream job.
description.schinese: 离开村庄去追求理想的工作。
description.tchinese: 離開村莊去追求理想的工作。

description.english: Ignoring the tasks given. Prepare to get scolded.
description.schinese: 无视接受的任务。做好被责骂的准备。
description.tchinese: 無視接受的任務。做好被責罵的準備。

description.english: Having another plan. Life always needs challenges.
description.schinese: 产生一个新计划。生活离不开挑战。
description.tchinese: 產生一個新計劃。生活離不開挑戰。

description.english: Showing bravery and hardwork is a plus point to be a gravekeeper.
description.schinese: 作为一名守墓人，具血勇敢和勤奋的品质是加分项。
description.tchinese: 作為一名守墓人，具血勇敢和勤奮的品質是加分項。

description.english: Picking someone's favorite flower is rude, just prepare for the worst.
description.schinese: 摘别人最喜欢的花是不礼貌的，准备好承担这后果吧。
description.tchinese: 摘別人最喜歡的花是不禮貌的，準備好承擔這後果吧。

displayName.english: Good Deed Erased by A Sin

description.english: Running away from the cemetery with someone else's money.
description.schinese: 拿着别人的钱逃离墓地。
description.tchinese: 拿著別人的錢逃離墓地。

description.english: Calling the local authority for safety.
description.schinese: 打电话给当地政府寻求安全保护。
description.tchinese: 打電話給當地政府尋求安全保護。

description.english: Doing a careless gravekeeping job resulted in a massive fire accident.
description.schinese: 守墓工作中的粗心导致了一场大火事故。
description.tchinese: 守墓工作中的粗心導致了一場大火事故。

description.english: Destroying one grave and another unknowingly, or mercilessly?
description.schinese: 不知不觉中还是毫不留情地毁坏了一座又一座坟墓?
description.tchinese: 不知不覺中還是毫不留情地毀壞了一座又一座墳墓?

description.english: Forgetting a crucial fact can lead into a disaster, just like Cecep forgetting that he can't swim.
description.schinese: 忘记一个重要的事实往往会导致一场灾难，就像西塞普忘记他根本不会游泳一样。
description.tchinese: 忘記一個重要的事實往往會導致一場災難，就像西塞普忘記他根本不會游泳一樣。

description.english: Trying to see more than our own ability, is it worth it?
description.schinese: 尝试突破自己的能力看到原本看不见的东西，这样做值得吗?
description.tchinese: 嘗試突破自己的能力看到原本看不見的東西，這樣做值得嗎?

description.english: Making money fast and getting rich easily like flipping one's hands.
description.schinese: 快速赚钱，轻松致富就像动动手指一样简单。
description.tchinese: 快速賺錢，輕鬆致富就像動動手指一樣簡單。

displayName.english: The Tied Corpse is in Peace

description.english: Helping Indra to reach the peace in his eternal sleep.
description.schinese: 帮助英达拉在长眠中得以安息。
description.tchinese: 幫助英達拉在長眠中得以安息。

description.english: Getting every ritual steps right, but not that perfect.
description.schinese: 让每一个仪式步骤都正确，虽然并非那么完美。
description.tchinese: 讓每一個儀式步驟都正確，雖然並非那麼完美。

description.english: Leaving without finishing all steps of the ritual is a sign of imperfection.
description.schinese: 没有完成仪式的所有步骤就离开是不完美的表现。
description.tchinese: 沒有完成儀式的所有步驟就離開是不完美的表現。

description.english: Doing a good job as a gravekeeper, but missing one crucial item.
description.schinese: 守墓工作干得不错，但少了一件重要的东西。
description.tchinese: 守墓工作幹得不錯，但少了一件重要的東西。

description.english: Getting married with a long love girlfriend.
description.schinese: 和恋爱已久的女友结婚。
description.tchinese: 和戀愛已久的女友結婚。

description.english: Being too coward to stay and do the job as a gravekeeper.
description.schinese: 由于不够勇敢，不敢留下继续做守墓人的工作。
description.tchinese: 由於不夠勇敢，不敢留下繼續做守墓人的工作。

description.english: Joining a cult. Let's hope it's not a weird one.
description.schinese: 加入一个教派，希望不是什么邪恶组织。
description.tchinese: 加入一個教派，希望不是什麼邪惡組織。

description.english: Getting buried alive inside one of the graves.
description.schinese: 被活埋在其中一个坟墓里。
description.tchinese: 被活埋在其中一個墳墓裡。

description.english: Staring too long at the ghost is always a bad thing.
description.schinese: 盯着幽灵看太久可不会有什么好事。
description.tchinese: 盯著幽靈看太久可不會有什麼好事。

description.english: Falling into a deep well and eventually die.
description.schinese: 掉进一口深井里，最终死去。
description.tchinese: 掉進一口深井裡，最終死去。

description.english: Going on with life without having anything to do with her Father.
description.schinese: 抛下父亲，开始一个人的生活。
description.tchinese: 拋下父親，開始一個人的生活。

description.english: Having a second thought about taking the inheritance.
description.schinese: 重新考虑继承的问题。
description.tchinese: 重新考慮繼承的問題。

description.english: Getting money solely from pawning grandfather's items.
description.schinese: 靠典当外祖父的东西筹到钱
description.tchinese: 靠典當外祖父的東西籌到錢

description.english: Collecting the items for pawning but not get enough money.
description.schinese: 典当部分物品得到些钱，但还不够
description.tchinese: 典當部分物品得到些錢，但還不夠

description.english: Arriving at the pawnshop too late.
description.schinese: 到达当铺太晚了
description.tchinese: 到達當舖太晚了

description.english: Becoming the master of the creature.
description.schinese: 成为生物的主人
description.tchinese: 成為生物的主人

description.english: Starting life as a criminal.
description.schinese: 以罪犯的身份开始生活
description.tchinese: 以罪犯的身份開始生活

description.english: Stealing from houses to houses.
description.schinese: 挨家挨户地偷窃
description.tchinese: 挨家挨戶地偷竊

description.english: Becoming the hero of the family.
description.schinese: 成为家族英雄
description.tchinese: 成為家族英雄

description.english: Working hard but not enough.
description.schinese: 非常努力，可一无所获
description.tchinese: 非常努力，可一無所獲

description.english: Doing something helpful, but not to all.
description.schinese: 做一些有用的事情，但不是对所有人都如此
description.tchinese: 做一些有用的事情，但不是對所有人都如此

description.english: Becoming a girl with a nice heart.
description.schinese: 成为一个心地善良的女孩
description.tchinese: 成為一個心地善良的女孩

displayName.english: To Regret or Not To Regret

description.english: Regretting the decision to end everything.
description.schinese: 后悔决定结束一切
description.tchinese: 後悔決定結束一切

description.english: Gaining nothing because of the heroic act.
description.schinese: 出于这种英雄的行为，结果什么也得不到
description.tchinese: 出於這種英雄的行為，結果什麼也得不到

description.english: Keeping more than one creature.
description.schinese: 拥有一个以上的生物
description.tchinese: 擁有一個以上的生物

description.english: Killing two birds with one stone by selling it off.
description.schinese: 把它出售，一举两得
description.tchinese: 把它出售，一舉兩得

description.english: Taking kris without respecting the spiritual owner.
description.schinese: 在未尊重蛇剑刀主人的情况下将它取走
description.tchinese: 在未尊重蛇劍刀主人的情況下將它取走

description.english: Taking kris with permission from the kris' spiritual owner.
description.schinese: 从克里斯的主人那里得到许可。
description.tchinese: 從克里斯的主人那裡得到許可。

description.english: Acting disrespectful and taking a sacred ring without permission.
description.schinese: 不尊重他人，未经允许拿走神圣的戒指。
description.tchinese: 不尊重他人，未經允許拿走神聖的戒指。

description.english: Taking the ring with a good intention.
description.schinese: 带着善意拿走戒指。
description.tchinese: 帶著善意拿走戒指。

description.english: Bringing a spear into your home carelessly.
description.schinese: 不小心把矛带回家。
description.tchinese: 不小心把矛帶回家。

description.english: Having a cleansed spear that can protect you from evil.
description.schinese: 拥有一支净化过的矛可以保护你远离邪恶。
description.tchinese: 擁有一支淨化過的矛可以保護你遠離邪惡。

description.english: Disturbing the peace by taking a sacred, uncleansed sculpture.
description.schinese: 拿一个神圣的，未被清洗的雕塑来扰乱和平。
description.tchinese: 拿一個神聖的，未被清洗的雕塑來擾亂和平。

description.english: Getting an antique, cleansed, sacred sculpture.
description.schinese: 得到一个古董的，净化的，神圣的雕塑
description.tchinese: 得到一個古董的，淨化的，神聖的雕塑

description.english: Owning a spiritual creature, but regretting it.
description.schinese: 拥有一个灵性生物，但后悔了。
description.tchinese: 擁有一個靈性生物，但後悔了。

description.english: Feeling so done with the money and the spiritual creature.
description.schinese: 我觉得金钱和精神上的东西都应该如此。
description.tchinese: 我覺得金錢和精神上的東西都應該如此。

description.english: Commiting an arson accidentally.
description.schinese: 意外纵火。
description.tchinese: 意外縱火。

description.english: Wandering about and getting lost.
description.schinese: 四处游荡，迷失方向。
description.tchinese: 四處遊蕩，迷失方向。

description.english: Getting trapped in another dimension. Watch out!
description.schinese: 被困在另一个维度。小心!
description.tchinese: 被困在另一個維度。小心!

description.english: Being greedy and collecting all sacred items in the house.
description.schinese: 贪婪地收集家里所有的神圣物品。
description.tchinese: 貪婪地收集家裡所有的神聖物品。

displayName.schinese: 懂得尊敬的机会主义者
displayName.tchinese: 懂得尊敬的機會主義者

description.english: Being careful by asking for a permission before getting all items, especially the sacred ones.
description.schinese: 在索取物品之前，一定要小心，尤其是那些神圣的物品。
description.tchinese: 在索取物品之前，一定要小心，尤其是那些神聖的物品。

description.english: Attacked by an unknown being.
description.schinese: 被未知的生物攻击。
description.tchinese: 被未知的生物攻擊。

description.english: Arriving safely back to home without any scratch.
description.schinese: 安然无恙地回到家中。
description.tchinese: 安然無恙地回到家中。

description.english: Knowing the secret behind your identity with your own effort to survive.
description.schinese: 用自己的努力去了解自己身份背后的秘密。
description.tchinese: 用自己的努力去了解自己身份背後的秘密。

description.english: Managing to escape from the vicious attack.
description.schinese: 设法从恶毒的攻击中逃脱。
description.tchinese: 設法從惡毒的攻擊中逃脫。

description.english: Knowing the real story behind the dreadful attack.
description.schinese: 知道了可怕袭击背后的真实故事。
description.tchinese: 知道了可怕襲擊背後的真實故事。

description.english: Getting ready for the battle once and for all.
description.schinese: 为一劳永逸的战斗做好准备。
description.tchinese: 為一勞永逸的戰鬥做好準備。

description.english: Becoming more mindful now after going through everything.
description.schinese: 在经历了这一切之后，现在变得更加小心翼翼。
description.tchinese: 在經歷了這一切之後，現在變得更加小心翼翼。

description.english: Leaving your loved ones for your own safety. Coward!
description.schinese: 为了自己的安全离开你爱的人。胆小鬼!
description.tchinese: 為了自己的安全離開你愛的人。膽小鬼!

description.english: Looking for something too long until you get caught!
description.schinese: 寻找某物花的时间太长，最终被抓住了！
description.tchinese: 尋找某物花的時間太長，最終被抓住了！

description.english: Trying to call your husband for help, but crashing to a greater danger instead.
description.schinese: 试着打电话给你的丈夫求助，但却陷入了更大的危险之中。
description.tchinese: 試著打電話給你的丈夫求助，但卻陷入了更大的危險之中。

description.english: Looking for a hiding place too long and being too careful.
description.schinese: 找藏身之处太久，太过于小心。
description.tchinese: 找藏身之處太久，太過於小心。

description.english: Losing a battle because doing a list of wrong decisions.
description.schinese: 因为做了一系列错误的决定而输掉了一场战斗。
description.tchinese: 因為做了一系列錯誤的決定而輸掉了一場戰鬥。

description.english: Asking for other's help only for failling to survive.
description.schinese: 寻求别人的帮助只是为了生存。
description.tchinese: 尋求別人的幫助只是為了生存。

description.english: Forgetting the real reason and instead, trying to find another source of power for your own greed.
description.schinese: 忘记真正的原因，试着为自己的贪婪寻找另一种力量。
description.tchinese: 忘記真正的原因，試著為自己的貪婪尋找另一種力量。

description.english: Choosing an instant way to take your revenge.
description.schinese: 选择一个即时的方式进行报复。
description.tchinese: 選擇一個即時的方式進行報復。

description.english: Falling into despair and giving up halfway of the journey.
description.schinese: 陷入绝望，半途而废。
description.tchinese: 陷入絕望，半途而廢。

description.english: Staying too long in one place and does not immediately go towards the goal.
description.schinese: 在一个地方呆太久，并不能立即达到目标。
description.tchinese: 在一個地方呆太久，並不能立即達到目標。

description.english: Failing to defeat the enemy who brings all the misery.
description.schinese: 未能打败带来这一切苦难的敌人。
description.tchinese: 未能打敗帶來這一切苦難的敵人。

description.english: Getting the last step wrong.
description.schinese: 最后一步做错了。
description.tchinese: 最後一步做錯了。

description.english: Winning the journey in killing The Hungry Witch.
description.schinese: 杀死飞头蛮，获得最终胜利。
description.tchinese: 殺死飛頭蠻，獲得最終勝利。

displayName.english: The Conqueror of All Pamali Journeys

description.english: You have successfully finishing all the endings in Pamali. Kudos!
description.schinese: 您已经成功完成了Pamali的所有结局。 荣誉！
description.tchinese: 您已經成功完成了Pamali的所有結局。 榮譽！
